WorkItem.Description:
When trying to compile the sample in samples/node using the instructions in samples/node/README.txt i get a compilation error.

```
C:\typescript-0.9.1.0\samples\node>tsc --module node TcpServer.ts
warning TS5003: Module code generation 'node' not supported.
```
and
```
C:\typescript-0.9.1.0\samples\node>tsc --module node HttpServer.ts
warning TS5003: Module code generation 'node' not supported.
```

I run version: 
```
C:\typescript-0.9.1.0\samples\node>tsc -v
Version 0.9.1.0
```

It seems the example compiles fine when replacing "--module node" with "--module commonjs", like this:

```
C:\typescript-0.9.1.0\samples\node>tsc --module commonjs HttpServer.ts
```

However I'm not sure commonjs is the best option here.

Suggested fix: update README.txt with the appropriate command line for compiling.
WorkItem.Summary: Node sample does not compile with instructions in README.txt
